availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas E. Gregory (Marshall Co., KY, farmer)

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of P. R. Gregory. Married to Martha A. L. Howard Gregory in Marshall County, Kentucky, on October 9, 1862. Father of Francis M. Gregory. Farmer in Marshall County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 854.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Birmingham, p. 228A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Marshall County Marriages, 1842-1917, Film #000321353.
